Hi all,

I am trying to do write some *simple* multi-threaded junit tests. On 
the junit web site, they have the article on using groboutils - 
specifically the multi-threaded grobotutil extensions. 

First, the sample code that's on the grobotutils page doesn't work 
for me. I get the asser shown below, which seems to be coming from 
junit. The jayunit doc says that for a noClassDefFoundError to ensure 
that junit is on the classpath - I have already done this. I'm using 
Junit 3.8.1 that is included in Eclipse 3.0, and have added the 
junit.jar file to the build path. I'm stuck on this one. :(

Second, can I get a recommendation from the group on this groboutil 
tool? Or is there something better that is part of junit? I'm new to 
this junit stuff, so any help would be appreciated.
